resources.string: The Art Gallery of Ontario \(AGO\) \(French: Musee des beaux-arts de l\'Ontario\) is an art museum in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. Its collection includes more than 80,000 works spanning the first century to the present day. The gallery has 45,000 square metres \(480,000 sq ft\) of physical space, making it one of the largest galleries in North America.
